about_the_game:
Gameplay is follows: you drag & drop any mp3/wav music track into game's window and it breaks up into short puzzle pieces and gets shuffled. Now you have to put it back together using nothing but sound, colors are purely decorative. You can listen to any pieces as many times as you want, take your time there is no pressure :)

If you made mistake game will tell you how many, but wont show you the place :)
Post game you have some stats: time taken, all time best, number of times you listened to a piece.

There are 7 tracks included with the game, kindly provided by various artists, this will let you checkout the game. But main focus is that you will bring your own music library. After all this is Your Music Puzzle.

Your game experience is highly dependent on music you choose. If its some hardcore Dubstep, then you will be in for 10-15 minutes of brain melting frenzy putting together a drop from barely differentiable pieces. If its calm, vocal focused song, then you are about to dive in into 30 minutes of relaxation and meditation :)

I originally made this game for myself and so far been playing it for almost a full year. It gives me unique experience of seeing my favorite songs from a new side. I often caught myself discovering new background sounds and instruments in tracks I listened to a hundred times.

Game features sofar:
- support for music in mp3/flac/opus/wav formats
- 7 tracks/songs included with the game
- local leaderboards
- visual effects that react to music

Now you have to put it back together using nothing but sound, colors are purely decorative. You can listen to any pieces as many times as you want, take your time there is no pressure :)

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu, Arch, Manjaro
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 1200
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu, Arch, Manjaro
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 1200
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX650
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: Your Music Puzzle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8 or 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 1200
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64bit version only
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7/8 or 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 1200
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX650
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64bit version only

short_description: A puzzle game, where pieces are generated based on your mp3/wav music. Put the track back into shape using sound as your only clue. Pop, rock, rap, classics - this game works perfectly with all music genres.
